meaningMnemonic: The <radical>shellfish</radical> radical and the <kanji>shellfish</kanji> kanji are the same! It can be just the <kanji>shell</kanji> part too.
readingMnemonic: To get some <kanji>shellfish</kanji>, all you have to do is hop in your <reading>kay</reading>ak (かい) and get some. Shellfish live in the water.
